about_me.en: I am Jiahui Yang, a second-year master student from Xiamen University, advised by Professor Zhirong Shen. I am a system researcher. My research focus on in-memory cache and storage reliability. I am so excited about the Erasure codes.
about_me.zh: 我是杨佳晖，来自厦门大学计算机技术专业的二年级硕士研究生，导师是沈志荣教授。我是一名系统研究员。我的研究重点是内存缓存和存储可靠性。我对纠删码非常感兴趣。
